creator: Lethona Technologies
descriptionHtml:
Lethona Document scanning app is a simple and easy to use portable phone pdf document scanner app to scan photos, reports, documents, receipts and more and convert it into a pdf or jpeg for print or have in an organised drive. Our PDF document scanner is easy to use and user friendly to scan and convert your documents as softcopy pdf in seconds. You can easily name the files and organize it and share it with people in a single click.

Document scanner app by Lethona is the best and easy to use for scanning documents in high quality pdf and Image format. Using our PDF Scanner app you can scan and store pictures, graphical materials, written documents and printed docs.

Now you don’t need to go to the shop to scan your documents, identity proofs, marksheets, resumes and other documents and images to send it over mail. Just download our document scanning app and scan the document or image then crop it as you need then download in your preferred size like a4, a3 and more then send it over mail. That’s all it’s done that easy doing this. You can cut the cost you spend in shops for scanning the documents and buying scanners. You can use lethona document scanning and pdf creator app for scanning the following

-Office and personal documents
-To Scan Pictures
-Printed documents
-Business and personal receipts
-Classroom notes & book pages
-Resumes & photos
-Mark-sheets, certificates and more.

Document Scanning app is must for every person specially for business professionals, entrepreneurs, University, college and school students, government and private employees, employers, housewives and others.

Our Document scanning is free of cost and will be useful for everyone. Scan and Save PDF or Image in a fraction of seconds using your smartphone camera. Lethona free pdf scanner app is making life easier and saves so much time for you and improves productivity. Document scanner application online is very easy to use and simple photo scanning app to save your time & money standing in a queue in printing and scanning shops. Download and use our Free document scanner app for android free download and share it with your contacts.
Our PDF scanner app will be very useful for businesses to keep track of expenses, scan business cards, clients contracts and other important documents.

Smartphone PDF Scanner App for university/college and school students.

Using our Document scanning app students can scan their homeworks, praticals, projects, marksheets, identity card, resumes, fees receipt and more.


The Document Scanner application has the following features.

-Easy to remove clutter background and generate hd jpeg or pdf files.
-Supports multiple file sizes.
-Many adjustment option to finetune scanned documents.
-Color balance options available
-Easy to scan any documents or photos.
descriptionShort: Best Document Scanning app to scan documents, photos, bills, receipts and more.
